Get lyrics for Alex Fong 方中信 (Chung-Sun) songs at MyAsianArtist.
ABOUT

Alex Fong, Chung-Sun Fong (方中信) is a Hong Kong actor.
data.text:
ABOUT

Alex Fong, Chung-Sun Fong (方中信) is a Hong Kong actor.

TRIVIA

Birthplace: Macao, China

Height: 182cm

-He is married to actress Hoyan Mok in 2008; they have one daughter.

-2008 Alex is brand representative of DOXA, a brand of watches

-A female guest at the opening ceremony of DOXA's (Guangzhou) ran up to the stage and bear hugged Alex

After the event, DOXA issued an open declaration stating Fong's under-performing had harmed the image of the brand, and therefore terminate the co-operation.
